TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CertificateClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The CertificateClient provides synchronous and asynchronous methods to manage s in Azure Key Vault. The client supports creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, purging, backing up, restoring, and listing the , along with managing certificate s and s. The client also supports listing for a soft delete enabled key vault.
